td.bold: Bentham Science Publishers offers a fast publication service called QUICK TRACK which allows rapid publication of those papers as per the consent of the authors

quick-track.p: QUICK TRACK allows online publication within 2 weeks of receipt of the final approved galley proofs from the authors. Similarly, the manuscript is published in the next forthcoming PRINT issue of the journal. The total publication time from the date of first receipt of manuscript to its online publication is 10 – 12 weeks subject to its acceptance by the referees and modification (if any) by the authors within one week.
There are two modes of Fast Track Service.

sec.title: Author’s Benefits
sec.p: If you are willing to publish your review or research in rapid fashion, Quick Track is the best choice. You can depend on this service as it ensures fulfillment and compliance to all of your requirements before and after publication.
This mode of publication aims instant access to the recent developments and researches in the various fields.

All the Quick Track articles are dealt with priority. All submissions are reviewed within a week after assessment and acceptance of their suitability for the journal’s aims and scope by the Editorial Board.
This premium process of publication allows online publication in advance to the print edition.

sec.title: Terms and Conditions
sec.p: Authors are encouraged to submit the revised manuscript within 48 hours for timely publication of their manuscripts submitted in QUICK TRACK category.

Only articles requiring minor revision as suggested by the reviewers will be acceptable for Quick Track publication whereas articles with requiring major revision will be processed through standard publication procedure.

sec.title: Discounts
sec.p: Authors who opt for this fee-based service do not have to pay the page charge for Research Articles in addition.
Moreover, authors who have availed Quick Track service in a BSP journal will be entitled for an exclusive 30% discount if they again wish to avail the same services in any BSP journal.
Authors who select the Quick Track publication option and also wish to have their article as Open Access Plus will avail a 50% discount off the journal open access publication fee.

sec.title: Contact Us
sec.p: For any query or suggestion, please contact us on Fastrack@benthamscience.org
